issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: hi if i try to add overlay to Camera the aspect ratio is wrong (also if i rotate it) i think it is ok with iphone 4 devices family, you can try it in kitchensink
fields.summary: Wrong Camera Aspect ration if overlay is added ( iphone 5 )

comments.body: Please let us know the exact KitchenSink test you are running to reproduce this issue. It would also be helpful if you can describe the expected and actual behavior.
hi, the test is the Camera Overlay, the aspect ratio is wrong with iphone 5, i think is more correct to choose the top margin of the view and maintain the correct aspect ratio

We tested Kitchen Sink for Camera Overlay functionality and we could not reproduce the issue. Would it be possible for you to post a video of the issue so that we can make sure that we are trying to reproduce the same issue?
Resolving this ticket as we cannot reproduce this issue and the reporter has not followed up.
